PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Online Application for Faculty Positions at IIT Mandi
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: In this project I designed a web portal through PHP, HTML and CSS. Used MySQL for data storage purposes and JavaScript for additional functionality such as form input validation. As of 5 May 2013, more than two thousand, five hundred applications have been received and processed.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Online Application for MS/PhD admissions at IIT Mandi
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: In this project I developed a web portal through PHP, HTML and CSS. Implemented MVC architecture using Symfony PHP framework. Used JavaScript for form input validation and for customizing of UI according to the user input. As of 5 May 2013, more than four thousand applications have been received and processed.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Automated Water Level Monitoring and Management
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: An economic attempt at minimizing the risk involved in monitoring water level in house holds and commercial complexes.

In this project, I customized FreeSMS for collecting course feedback at IIT Mandi. Added the role of Dean of Academics, added functionalities like derolling from a course, requesting teacher’s consent prior enrolling to a course, generating feedback reports in PDF format, preventing multiple feedback submissions , etc.
Associated with ITU, Copenhagen under-graduates in making“employee information”
